title: 134: The Vaccine Q&A with Dr. Steve Episode
itunes:title: The Vaccine Q&A with Dr. Steve Episode
description: In this very special episode, Lisa asks infectious disease specialist Dr. Steve Threlkeld the questions you have about the Covid-19 vaccines. Dr. Steve answers questions like: how long does the vaccine last, can I still carry the virus after getting the vaccine, what is the risk versus reward with the vaccine, and so much more! Plus, he answers the biggest question we all want to know: when will life get back to normal? So go ahead and push play now!
itunes:summary: This week, Lisa goes one-on-one with her friend, infectious disease expert Dr. Steve on everything you need to know about the Covid-19 vaccines.
itunes:author: Lisa Lillien
dc:creator: Lisa Lillien
